revision.text:
This is the default [[sound sequence]] for doors not using a particular texture in ''[[Strife]]''.
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== The definition redirects to a different sound sequence as appropriate for the door's speed and movement. [DoorSmallMetal 0 [[DoorOpenSmallMetal]] 1 [[DoorCloseSmallMetal]] 2 [[DoorOpenBlazing]] 3 [[DoorCloseBlazing]] ] [[Category:Sound sequences]]
